content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. Based on your interest and qualifications, I believe we can come to an agreement on a rental price. May I ask what you are looking to pay per month for this 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price, but I am willing to be flexible. What do you suggest?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I understand. Based on the current market rates in Munich, I suggest a rental price of €650 per month. This price takes into account the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current demand in the area. However, I am open to negotiating and am willing to consider lowering the price if you have a valid reason for doing so. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I think that's a fair price. I agree to the price of €650 per month. Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: You're welcome, Juan. I'm glad we could come to an agreement on a rental price that works for both of us. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns before we proceed with the lease agreement. I look forward to working with you.
name: Heinrich Heine
